Ritual daggers of the Loviatan faith were enchanted blades created to inflict pain and suffering on the willing and unwilling.
Loviatan ritual daggers were decorated, sharp blades with their leather handles smothered by much use. These daggers possessed the Pain Maidens blessing enchantments that boosted the wielders ability to hit the target and increased their ability to withstand punishment after each successful slash against the target.
